'''Ashley Suzanne Johnson''' is an American actress, beginning her career as a child actress, best known for portraying [https://growing-pains.fandom.com/wiki/Chrissy_Seaver Chrissy Seaver] on the sitcom ''{{Wikipedia|Growing Pains}}''. As an adult, she became a prolific voice actor, portraying characters such as {{Wikipedia|Ellie (The Last of Us)|Ellie}} in ''{{Wikipedia|The Last of Us}}'' and ''{{Wikipedia|Gwen Tennyson}}'' in the {{Wikipedia|Ben 10}} franchise.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
In 2015, Johnson was announced to be voicing {{MCSM|Petra}} in {{MCSM}}, the first spin-off game in the ''[[Minecraft]]'' franchise.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.eurogamer.net/telltale-reveals-minecraft-story-mode-starring-patton-oswalt|title=Telltale's Minecraft: Story Mode unveiled, stars Patton Oswalt|author=Jeffrey Matulef|website=Eurogamer|date=July 4, 2015}}</ref><ref>{{Citation|url=https://movieweb.com/minecraft-story-mode-trailer-voice-cast/|title=Minecraft Story Mode Trailer Features Patton Oswalt & Corey Feldman|author=Brian Gallagher|website=MovieWeb|date=Jul 6, 2015}}</ref> In 2017, she would return for [[Minecraft: Story Mode - Season Two|''Minecraft: Story Mode - Season Two'']], and the following year reprised the role a third time, providing a unique tutorial sequence for the [[Netflix]] version of the original game.
